data.eml:eml: cichlid species (Teleostei, Perciformes) from Guinea, West Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lamboj, Anton (2004): cichlid species (Teleostei, Perciformes) from Guinea, West Africa. Zootaxa 454: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157489
